name: (win) Water Beneath Mars (LD29 48h Compo Submission)
description:
(win) Water Beneath Mars (LD29 48h Compo Submission) is a strategy game developed by Crawler Games. It was originally released in 2014.
(win) Water Beneath Mars (LD29 48h Compo Submission) is available on PC and macOS. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
